General.Name: Marssenger Kitchenware Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Marssenger Kitchenware Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of kitchen appliances and other household electrical appliances in China. It offers integrated stoves, integrated sinks, integrated dishwashers, kitchen cabinets, household ovens, steam ovens, disinfection cabinets, and other products. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Haining, China.
